input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter to use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

The items XML used to perform "Retrieve Selected Cluster Configuration Properties" operation. Sample items XML input shown below
<items>
<item>
<parameters>
<cluster-compute-resource>TestCluster</cluster-compute-resource>
<spec-set>
<prop-set>
<path-set-list>
<!-- 1 or more repitition -->
<path-set>configuration</path-set>
<path-set>network</path-set>
<path-set>resourcePool</path-set>
<path-set>datastore</path-set>
</path-set-list>
</prop-set>
</spec-set>
</parameters>
</item>
</items>
cluster-compute-resource: Specifies the name of the cluster whose details are to be retrieved Valid value: Any string
path-set: Specify the seletive properties to be fetched, below are the known properties (can be more based on the VC environment configuration
<path-set>actionHistory</path-set> <path-set>alarmActionsEnabled</path-set> <path-set>availableField</path-set> <path-set>configIssue</path-set> <path-set>configStatus</path-set> <path-set>configuration</path-set> <path-set>configurationEx</path-set> <path-set>customValue</path-set> <path-set>datastore</path-set> <path-set>declaredAlarmState</path-set> <path-set>disabledMethod</path-set> <path-set>drsFault</path-set> <path-set>drsRecommendation</path-set> <path-set>effectiveRole</path-set> <path-set>environmentBrowser</path-set> <path-set>host</path-set> <path-set>migrationHistory</path-set> <path-set>path-set</path-set> <path-set>network</path-set> <path-set>overallStatus</path-set> <path-set>parent</path-set> <path-set>permission</path-set> <path-set>recentTask</path-set> <path-set>recommendation</path-set> <path-set>resourcePool</path-set> <path-set>summary</path-set> <path-set>tag</path-set> <path-set>triggeredAlarmState</path-set> <path-set>value</path-set>

Description:
connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>
